00006 std::string ORIP408DigitalIODecoder::GetParName( size_t iPar )
00007 {
00008   switch(iPar) {
00009     case 0: return "Crate";
00010     case 1: return "Card";
00011     case 2: return "IPSlot";
00012     case 3: return "Time";
00013     case 4: return "WriteMask";
00014     case 5: return "ReadMask";
00015     case 6: return "WriteValue";
00016     case 7: return "ReadValue";
00017     default:
00018       ORLog(kWarning) << "GetParName(): index (" << iPar
00019                       << ") out of range." << std::endl;
00020       return "unknown";
00021   }
00022 }
00023 
00024 UInt_t ORIP408DigitalIODecoder::GetPar( UInt_t* record, 
00025                                   size_t iPar, 
00026                                   size_t /*iRow*/ )
00027 {
00028   switch(iPar) {
00029     case 0: return CrateOf( record );
00030     case 1: return CardOf( record );
00031     case 2: return IPSlotNumberOf( record );
00032     case 3: return TimeOf( record );
00033     case 4: return WriteMaskOf( record );
00034     case 5: return ReadMaskOf( record );
00035     case 6: return WriteValueOf( record );
00036     case 7: return ReadValueOf( record );
00037     default:
00038       ORLog(kWarning) << "GetParName(): index (" << iPar
00039                       << ") out of range." << std::endl;
00040       return 0;
00041   }
00042 }
